name: Re-touch
description:
Retouch is a hypertext game based on a fictional narrative. This game represents part of a girl's experience while exploring certain choice hypotheses that ultimately failed to come up with. This game has many choices, and one of the many possible paths reflects that girl's experience. More contextual background information will find in the game.

 

The main context of that girl is, She is a victim of mental and physical abuse from her husband. She is from a very conservative, religious family. The emotion "Retouch" evokes a complex and unforgettable narrative. This story brings up disbelief, moral horror and yet genuine heart break as well. 

 

Although there is a warning in the game, it's worth declaring here: This work presents domestic violence experiences. It contains some graphics and depicts potentially troubling experiences and problems. If you are unsure about these topics and issues, consider this a clear trigger warning. It's not easy to write; depending on who you are, it will be challenging to read.
